main.name: Nathan Phennel
main.description: As a hybrid of tester/developer, I work closely with devs to design, perform, and automate testing
main.bio: I write mainly JavaScript code for end to end and integration tests. However, to make continuous testing a reality I leverage js to create needed tooling and infrastructure. To pun it lightly, I'm a jack of all trades and a master of test. In addition to performing and writing tests, I help to create procedures that give teams transparent actionable feedback to expose risk early and build confidence with every build.

testimonials.text: I definitely recommend Nathan as he is great Agile Tester with always a strong appetite to learn. He is broad minded and thinks outside of the box most of the time. He is mastering few automation languages.Hence, a great asset for any BA/QA/Testers team.
A high-achiever who is capable of digesting any new advanced technical knowledge you present at him. A studious individual who will take the extra miles/ hours.
